title: A Raisin in the Sun contradiction of perspectives

content.question: In contrast to the rest of Beneatha’s debate with Asagai, Asagai’s remark in line 26 (“You sound . . . intellectual”) provides

choices.label: a direct challenge to her reasoning
an indication of a possible misunderstanding

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
